thread.section_title: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TAXIBOX mobile self-storage | www.taxibox.com.au | 5 of 12
thread.title: Philip Nelson
thread.title_full: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage reviewed by Philip Nelson

author: Philip Nelson
title: Philip Nelson
text:
We found the whole Taxi-box concept to be exactly what we needed.
Once we had worked out that TB internal systems are very rigid and not built to accommodate the vagaries of clients (bloody customers), then we experienced a better relationship. As an example, you have to book (delivery) weeks in advance, and be very sure that you are not going to change any detail.
Despite the systems thing, the staff were pleasant and friendly. We will be using them again and will be recommending.
